text: (napiye!) Evar tam iraivanutaiya tirupporutttai natiyavarkalaka kalaiyilum, malaiyilum avanaip pirarttanai ceytu kontirukkirarkalo, avarkalutan nirum porumaiyai mer kontiruppiraka! Innum ulaka valkkaiyin alankarattai nati a(ttakaiya)varkalai vittum um iru kankalaiyum tiruppi vitatir; innum, evanutaiya itayattai nam'mai ninaivu kurvatiliruntu nam tiruppi vittomo avanai nir valipatatir; enenil avantan iccaiyaip pin parriyatanal avanutaiya kariyam varampu miriyamaki vittatu
